Rustypaste is a minimal, self-hostable file upload and pastebin service written in Rust. It supports features like file uploading, URL shortening, setting expiration times for files, one-shot links, MIME type guessing, and optional authentication. It can be deployed via Docker or built from source.

ğŸ“ ğ—”ğ—•ğ—¢ğ—¨ğ—§ ğ—§ğ—›ğ—œğ—¦ ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¢ğ—ğ—˜ğ—–ğ—§

PSCompletions is a PowerShell module designed to enhance the tab-completion experience. It provides a more powerful completion menu, allows for managing completions, dynamically sorts completion items based on usage frequency, and supports multiple languages. It aims to simplify and improve the user's interaction with PowerShell by offering intelligent and customizable tab completion.

ğŸ“ ğ—”ğ—•ğ—¢ğ—¨ğ—§ ğ—§ğ—›ğ—œğ—¦ ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¢ğ—ğ—˜ğ—–ğ—§

Mantella is a Python-based mod for Skyrim and Fallout 4 that enables natural language interaction with NPCs. It leverages speech-to-text (Whisper), Large Language Models (LLMs) for response generation, and text-to-speech (Piper, xVASynth, XTTS) for vocalization, creating a more immersive and dynamic gameplay experience.

The ungoogled-chromium project aims to provide a version of Google Chromium without dependencies on Google web services. It focuses on enhancing privacy, control, and transparency by removing Google-specific code and binaries, while retaining the default Chromium experience as closely as possible.

ğŸ“ ğ—”ğ—•ğ—¢ğ—¨ğ—§ ğ—§ğ—›ğ—œğ—¦ ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¢ğ—ğ—˜ğ—–ğ—§

Flow-Like is a visual workflow automation platform built with Rust, designed for enterprise-scale projects. It allows users to create automated workflows using a drag-and-drop interface, providing a clear record of data flow and changes. It supports AI integration, customizability, and deployment across various environments.

VIM Master is an in-browser game designed to teach users core Vim motions and editing commands through a series of short, focused levels. It provides a hands-on learning experience with features like normal/insert modes, command logging, progress tracking, and even a cheat mode for quick reference.
